-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A portable relational calculator
--   
--   This is a portable relational calculator. Relational data and
--   calculations are written in koshucode. This packages contains
--   <a>koshu</a> command. <a>koshu</a> reads koshucode data, calculates
--   it, and writes the result.
@package koshucode-baala-calculator
@version 0.200.0.0


-- | Version number.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version

-- | Version number of the Koshucode calculator.
version :: Version

-- | String representation of the version number.
versionString :: String


-- | Functions for implementing the Koshucode calculator.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Run

-- | Read and union sections from files, and run the section.
runFiles :: (CContent c, ToJSON c) => Global c -> [IOPoint] -> IO ExitCode

-- | Get proxy settings. This function looks environment variables of
--   <tt>http_proxy</tt>, <tt>https_proxy</tt>, and <tt>ftp_proxy</tt>.
getProxies :: IO [HttpProxy]


-- | Koshu filter program.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuFilter

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu-filter</tt> command.
koshuFilter :: (CContent c) => Global c -> (Resource c -> IO Int) -> IO Int
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuFilter.Option
instance GHC.Show.Show Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuFilter.Option


-- | Baala global data.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Global

-- | Global with operators.
baalaGlobal :: (CContent c) => Global c

-- | Relmap operators
baalaRops :: (CContent c) => [Rop c]


-- | Elements of data resource.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Element

-- | Retrive elements of data resource. This function may output judges of
--   the following classes.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><i><tt>KOSHU-AFFIRM</tt></i> There is affirmed relmap for class
--   <tt>/pat</tt> in the resource <tt>/res</tt>.</li>
--   <li><i><tt>KOSHU-DENY</tt></i> There is denied relmap for class
--   <tt>/pat</tt> in the resource <tt>/res</tt>.</li>
--   <li><i><tt>KOSHU-JUDGE-TERM</tt></i> In the resource <tt>/res</tt>,
--   there are judges of class <tt>/pat</tt> with term named <tt>/name</tt>
--   having <tt>/content</tt>.</li>
--   <li><i><tt>KOSHU-RELMAP-NAME</tt></i> There is a relmap named
--   <tt>/name</tt> in the resource <tt>/res</tt>.</li>
--   <li><i><tt>KOSHU-RELMAP-REF</tt></i> Relmap <tt>/name</tt> in the
--   resource <tt>/res</tt> refers the other relmap <tt>/ref</tt>.</li>
--   <li><i><tt>KOSHU-RELMAP-ROP</tt></i> Relmap <tt>/name</tt> in the
--   resource <tt>/res</tt> uses the relmap operator <tt>/rop</tt>.</li>
--   <li><i><tt>KOSHU-RELMAP-SOURCE</tt></i> Judges of class <tt>/pat</tt>
--   with terms <tt>/terms</tt> are read from the resource
--   <tt>/res</tt>.</li>
--   </ul>
resourceElem :: (CContent c) => Resource c -> [Judge c]


-- | A portable relational calculator.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuMain

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu</tt> command. See <a>baalaRops</a> for
--   default argument.
koshuMain :: (CContent c, ToJSON c) => Global c -> IO ExitCode
instance GHC.Show.Show (Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuMain.Param c)
